cordova-plugin-geolocation.GEOLOCATION_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Plastic Patrol needs to know where you are so it can place the photo of the plastic that you collect in the map

cordova-plugin-camera.CAMERA_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Plastic Patrol needs camera access to take pictures of the plastic that you collect.
cordova-plugin-camera.PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Plastic Patrol needs photo library access to get the picture of the plastic that you collect.
